mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parking (name, location, space_no, is_occupied, cctv_url) VALUES (#{name}, #{location}, #{spaceNo}, #{isOccupied}, #{cctvUrl})
mapper.update: UPDATE parking SET name = #{name}, location = #{location}, space_no = #{spaceNo}, is_occupied = #{isOccupied}, cctv_url = #{cctvUrl} WHERE parking_id = #{parkingId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) -- 모든 주차 공간 FROM parking -- parking 테이블
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM parking WHERE is_occupied = 1 -- 1 = 사용중, 0 = 비어있음
mapper.update: UPDATE parking SET occupied_count = occupied_count + 1 WHERE parking_id = #{parkingId} AND occupied_count < total_space
mapper.select: SELECT parking_id AS id, name, total_space AS total, occupied_count AS occupied, ROUND((occupied_count / total_space) * 100, 1) AS rate FROM parking
